title: Chargrilled asparagus with olive oil and balsamic vinegar

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Drizzle the asparagus with the olive oil and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Heat a griddle pan until smoking hot and griddle the asparagus for about five minutes, or until charred on all sides.
To serve, place the asparagus onto a plate and drizzle with balsamic vinegar.
